description: Try our easy to follow Horseradish Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Horseradish Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup fresh horseradish, peeled and grated

recipeInstructions.text: Whip the cream, mustard, and sugar in a chilled medium bowl with an electric mixer on high speed until stiff peaks form.
Fold in the horseradish, vinegar, and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until ready to serve.
